title: FYP #35 Vulnerability Deepens Community with Dr. Curt Thompson
description:
If you’ve read the book, you’ve seen his name all over it. We’re talking about vulnerability with Dr. Curt Thompson, the role it plays in our relationships, and how we can be a safe friend to our few.

Find Dr. Curt Thompson’s book The Soul of Desire here: https://www.amazon.com/Soul-Desire-Discovering-Neuroscience-Community/dp/1514002108

Download the book club guide PDF here: jennieallen.com

Get your copy of Find Your People: findyourpeoplebook.com

Become one of our texties by texting the word PODCAST to 214-225-6267

Get $20 off your first purchase at rothys.com/madeforthis
